Name: HMS Despatch
Builder: Fairfield Shipbuilding and Engineering Company, Govan
Armament:
6 × single BL 6 in (152 mm) Mk XII guns
2 × single QF 4 in (102 mm) Mk V anti-aircraft guns
2 × single QF 2-pounder AA guns
4 × triple 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
Armour:
Waterline belt: 1.25–3 in (32–76 mm)
Deck: 1 in (25 mm)
Notes: Received a Le Cheminant deck watch from the Royal Observatory on 23 January 1933.[1]
